short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract all available Amazon product reviews and analyze them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Amazon Review Analyzer - Simplify Your Review Analysis

This free chrome extension helps e-commerce sellers, researchers, and customers quickly extract and analyze product reviews. With automated review scanning, this tool saves time and delivers actionable insights, helping you understand customer feedback and improve product strategy.

🎯 Features & Benefits:

🔍 Automatic Review Extraction: Instantly extract and aggregate reviews from any Amazon product page with just one click.

📂 CSV Export: Export all collected reviews to a CSV file with a single click for further analysis or reporting. 

🔐 Privacy First: Your review data remains private. We don’t save any research data on our servers. 

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration: Integrates directly into your browser, allowing review extraction without leaving your Amazon session.

🎁 Completely Free to Use: Enjoy all the features without any cost – no hidden fees.

Disclaimer: This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with Amazon or any of its associated companies. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently. A free license key is required to activate and use the extension.
